name: TECHdotMN
tagline: Media Production Company in Minneapolis, Minnesota
description:
We are a passionate group of technology enthusiasts on a mission to serve Minnesota’s tech ecosystem and the early stage ventures within it.  Through a mix of digital media, we create original Minnesota tech news and curate relevant local news from outside sources. 
When combined with Minnesota’s most comprehensive calendar of technology and entrepreneurial events, the deepest database of Minnesota tech companies, and industry employment opportunities.
